label.string: Final Volume of kerosine and Flyash (After immersion in constant water bath) (ml)
Weight of mercury before placing the sample in the permeability cell (m₁),g.
Weight of mercury after placing the sample in the permeability cell (m₂),g.

group.h6: Repeat the procedure with fresh cement beds until two values of V are obtained differing by less than 0.005 cm3.Record the mean of these two values as V
Take an amount (m1),g. of standard sample so as to give the sample bed of porosity e=0.500
*Using the sample whose fineness is to be calculated.
